metadata.name: GAN ate my De Kooning
metadata.description:
This work is one of my first 100% digital abstract artworks on the blockchain.

The starting point was an image produced with the help of AI which I then developed further using digitall collage, glitch effects and digital painting.

After several iterations and vacillating between figuration and abstraction the final result is a highly textural, layered abstract composition of pure digital colour and shape which acts as a hommage to the American abstract expressionist painters of the 1950s which I am greatly inspired by.

PNG format, 5000x3918px
2021
by Theo Chronis
